name: Snowball, PCS-PotN
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game Ultimate Wilderness © 2017, Paizo Inc.
effect: one ball of ice and snow
text: You conjure a ball of packed ice and snow that you can throw at a single target as a ranged touch attack. The snowball deals 1d6 points of cold damage per caster level (maximum 5d6) on a successful hit, and the target must make a successful Fortitude saving throw or be staggered for 1 round.
savingThrow_zh: 强韧，通过则部分生效 (见下)
text_zh: 你制造出一个冰雪制成的雪球用一次远程接触攻击扔向一个单一目标。如果成功命中，雪球会造成每施法者等级1d6 点寒冷伤害( 最高5d6)，并且目标必须要成功通过一个强韧豁免检定，否则恍惚一轮。 (译注：此法术在P#68:TSH有一同名法术，效果相同)
